website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price per ounce for dehydrated treats that deliver plenty of protein.
pros: All chicken used in these treats is sourced from poultry raised in the United States
Has a taste that most dogs will love
Great choice for dogs with food allergies, as the treats have a single ingredient
Treats have a crispy texture that gives dogs a satisfying crunch
cons: May be too hard for older dogs to chew

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 3 stars due to the price. This is nothing more than dehydrated chicken breast. I thought they would be something special, but after I received them, I went to SAMs club and purchased a 3 lbs bag for almost the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Txmmoore

customer_reviews.title: My dog literally jumps in the air for these
customer_reviews.text: Saying my dog loves these treats is putting it mildly! She literally jumps in the air to get them. I do wish they were a little less pricey but she loves them so I keep buying them!
customer_reviews.author: cleo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Puppy!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves the chunky and obviously delicious chicken shredders. Why are they called “shredders”? I wasn’t sure, but after seeing how the larger hard chunks easily shred in my puppy’s mouth as she chews them, I totally got it!
customer_reviews.author: Bookie Nookie

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them so much
customer_reviews.text: I regret buying this for my dog because now she wants this all the time. It's getting expensive :(
customer_reviews.author: Nha Hoan Le

customer_reviews.title: MY DOGS LOVE
customer_reviews.text: MY DOGS LOVE THIS CHICKEN. SHEDDERS. THEY GET A TREAT AT NIGHT AND ALL YOU HAVE TO SAY IS DO YOU WANT SOME CHICKEN AND THAT GETS THERE ATTENTION
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT PURCHASE FROM HERE! I Almost fed this to my little dog which could have been deadly!!! Fungus and mold was growing from brand new packages
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: My little baby girl loves loves loves these. I cut them in to little pieces so they go further and work well for treats for a 4 pound pup.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie's do like these they're little hesitant there a little hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie's do like these they're little hesitant there a little hard to chew but once they get that flavor they absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are these suppose to be very hard
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 small dogs, one is 6lbs and the other is 10 lbs. My dogs loved them but they were so HARD and had sharp edges when I snapped off. I'm afraid of damage to intestinal tract..are they suppose to be so hard ???
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Shih Tzu Jack Russel Terrier loves chicken shredders
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu Jack Russel Terrier mix loves these chicken shredders. Easy to rip to smaller pieces for training. We go through the bag too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: V. Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog really loves it! These treats are crispy and fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats!
customer_reviews.text: These treats are nothing more than dehydrated chicken breast. And my dog LOVES them. Some of them are too big so I break them up into smaller pieces. I actually tried one myself and they are just what they claim -- nothing but dehydrated chicken, and they actually tasted pretty darned good!
customer_reviews.author: Inquiring mind

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for stomach sensitive doggies
customer_reviews.text: I have a rat terrier who is 15 years old, and has stomach sensitivity issues. We're almost through an entire bag, and he hasn't had any issues with the treats at all. He also has sensitive teeth and he doesn't have any trouble eating them. The pieces are large and small, but the larger pieces you can easily break in half. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: sophias

customer_reviews.title: 808 crazee for chicken
customer_reviews.text: Loving these primal treats are 808 onolicious...they go crazee for them
customer_reviews.author: MyLovingBabies

product_meta.title: Primal Chicken Shredders
product_meta.description: All Primal Treats are made from single source proteins and offer a healthy choice for all pets, especially those with food allergies. Our treats are produced using low-temperature, slow cooking techniques such as freeze-drying and slow roasting, yielding high-density nutrition in a shelf-stable product. We recommend using our treats as a snack alternative, as well as for training and obedience rewards.
feature_bullets: All Primal Treats Are Produced Using Usda Meats, Poultry And Game Raised In The United States And New Zealand Without Antibiotics Or Added Hormones
High-Density Nutrition In A Shelf-Stable Snack Product
Single-Source Proteins And Offer A Healthy Choice For All Pets, Especially Those With Food Allergies.
